name: Paralympics Medal Count All-Time
content:
Description: Total medal win counts of countries around the world, in the Summer and Winter Paralympic Games

[Source](https://en.wikipedia.org)

Columns:

* Country (string): name of a country or region, with 3-letter code), of a Paralympic game participant
* Summer Paralympic Games Medal Wins (numerical): how many medals a given country has won in the Summer Paralympic Games
* Winter Paralympic Games Medal Wins (numerical): how many medals a given country has won in the Winter Paralympic Games
* Combined Total Paralympic Games Medal Wins (numerical): how many medals a given country has won in both the Winter and Summer Paralympic Games
